sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './AboutPage.css'; const AboutPage = () => { const education = [ { degree: "Master of Science in Computational Mathematical Engineering", institution: "Stanford University", period: "2025-2027", focus: "Mathematical Computational Finance Track", details: "Specializing in the intersection of advanced mathematics, computational methods, and financial modeling" }, { degree: "Bachelor of Science in Applied Mathematics and Computational Data Analysis", institution: "Georgia Institute of Technology", period: "2022-2025", focus: "CGPA: 3.97", details: "Comprehensive foundation in mathematical theory, statistical analysis, and computational methods" } ]; const experience = [ { title: "Fintech Fellow & Undergraduate Research Assistant", organization: "Financial Services Lab, Georgia Institute of Technology", period: "May 2024 - Present", location: "Atlanta, GA", responsibilities: [ "Creating a backtradding engine using Monte Carlo simulations and bootstrapping", "Coding framework for financial data using backtrader to compute 55 risk metrics per strategy", "Designing methods to scrape SEC-EDGAR filings (10-K, 10-Q, 8-K) and identify credit agreements" ] }, { title: "Quantitative Researcher", organization: "Prabhudas Liladhar", period: "Jan 2024 - Jul 2024", location: "Remote", responsibilities: [ "Collaborated with quantitative traders and engineers to develop contribution-attribution model for mutual funds", "Enhanced relative value analysis for mutual funds, improving analytical systems by 22%", "Developed a five-layer mutual fund analyzer using advanced statistical, quantitative, and econometric models", "Generated novel trading strategy and ML-based tool achieving 13.5% alpha with team of 15 researchers" ] }, { title: "Honours Undergraduate Teaching Assistant", organization: "Mathematics Department, Georgia Institute of Technology", period: "Aug 2023 - Dec 2024", location: "Atlanta, GA", responsibilities: [ "Teaching honours-level differential equations and multivariable calculus to classes of 50+ students biweekly" ] } ]; const research = [ { title: "SubjECTive-QA (NeurIPS Datasets and Benchmarks 2024)", period: "Aug 2023 - Dec 2024", description: "Measuring Subjectivity in Earnings Call Transcripts' QA Through Six-Dimensional Feature Analysis", awards: ["President's Undergraduate Research Award", "College of Sciences Award", "Student Government Award"] }, { title: "Language Modeling for the Future of Finance", period: "June 2024 - Present", description: "Scraped 400 papers from ACL Anthology using Selenium and filtered financial criteria to synthesize an initial taxonomy. Conducted in-depth analysis of the financial AI space over 7 years under review at CoLM." }, { title: "Words That Unite The World", period: "Aug 2024 - Present", description: "Scraped monetary policy communications from 27 central banks across 28 years (380k total sentences). Submitted 233 page paper to Neural Information Processing Systems D&B 2025." }, { title: "FIdent (Advised by Dr. Sung Ha Kang)", period: "Mar 2024 - Present", description: "Exploring novel applications for identifying differential equations (WeakIDENT) in noisy datasets and financial markets. Evaluating long-term stock behavior using Fast Fourier transforms, linear algebra, and differential equations." } ]; const skills = { "Programming": ["Python", "R", "C", "Java", "Power BI", "Microsoft Office Suite", "Visio", "SQL", "Azure", "Tableau", "MATLAB", "SAS"], "Libraries": ["PyTorch/TensorFlow", "QuantLib", "Alphalens", "Backtrader", "cvxpy", "QuantEcon", "scikit-learn", "Keras", "Transformers"], "Rankings": ["Putnam 2023 (Score: 20)", "AMC12A (India Rank #1, 144/150)"], "Certifications": ["Karate Black Belt (DAN II)", "PADI Divemaster (75+ Dives, 5 Specializations)", "Emergency First Responder"] }; const philosophy = [ "Mathematics as a Universal Language: I believe mathematics transcends cultural and linguistic barriers, serving as a fundamental tool for understanding and modeling complex systems in finance and beyond.", "Computational Innovation: The intersection of mathematical theory and computational power opens unprecedented opportunities for solving real-world financial challenges through data-driven insights.", "Continuous Learning: In the rapidly evolving fields of quantitative finance and machine learning, maintaining intellectual curiosity and adaptability is essential for meaningful contribution.", "Collaborative Research: The most impactful discoveries emerge from interdisciplinary collaboration, combining mathematical rigor with practical financial applications." ]; return (
∇
∫
∑
∂
λ

About Me

Mathematical Background & Philosophy

∫ passion · knowledge dx = innovation

∑ Education

{education.map((edu, index) => (
{edu.period}

{edu.degree}

{edu.institution}

{edu.focus}

{edu.details}

))}

λ Professional Experience

{experience.map((exp, index) => (

{exp.title}

{exp.organization}

{exp.period} {exp.location}
    {exp.responsibilities.map((resp, idx) => (
  • {resp}
    • ))}
))}

∂ Research Projects

{research.map((project, index) => (

{project.title}

{project.period}

{project.description}

{project.awards && (
Awards: {project.awards.join(', ')}
)}
))}

∇ Skills & Achievements

{Object.entries(skills).map(([category, items]) => (

{category}

{items.map((skill, index) => ( {skill} ))}
))}

∞ Philosophy & Approach

{philosophy.map((principle, index) => (
{index + 1}

{principle}

))}
limt→∞ (learning + experience) = expertise The Mathematics of Growth
); }; export default AboutPage;
